name: v1.1.5
body: * Show a warning if deb-get is not found in PATH

name: v1.1.4
body:
## What's Changed
* chore: Update README.md by @lefterisgar in https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/pull/26
* fix: Correct typo by @lefterisgar in https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/pull/27
* feat: Added PolKit action to reduce the number of times password is needed

## New Contributors
* @lefterisgar made their first contribution in https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/pull/26

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/compare/v1.1.3...v1.1.4

name: v1.1.3
body:
## What's Changed
* chore: fix desktop file to put Deborah in Settings and System categories by @ymauray in https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/pull/24
* fix: Installing a package doesn't reflect in the status immediately. Closes #22 by @ymauray in https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/pull/25


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/compare/v1.1.2...v1.1.3

name: v1.1.2
body:
## What's Changed
* fix: corrected small typo in options by @philclifford in https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/pull/17
* fix: custom added packages show up in app description. Closes #18 by @ymauray in https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/pull/19

## New Contributors
* @philclifford made their first contribution in https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/pull/17

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/compare/v1.1.1...v1.1.2

name: v1.1.1
body:
## What's Changed
* fix: show existing deb-get path on options page by @ymauray in https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/pull/15


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/compare/v1.1.0...v1.1.1

name: v1.1.0
body:
## What's Changed
* fix: forgot to revert test code. Closes #11 by @ymauray in https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/pull/12
* fix: Package details do not update when searching. Closes #7 by @ymauray in https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/pull/13
* fix: Search string disappears when switching to options and back. Closes #8 by @ymauray in https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/pull/14


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/compare/v1.0.2-beta...v1.1.0

name: v1.0.2-beta
body:
## What's Changed
* fix: response to "A Few minor comments". Closes #6. by @ymauray in https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/pull/10


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/compare/v1.0.0-beta.2...v1.0.2-beta

name: v1.0.0-beta.1
body:
## What's Changed
* misc: GitHub action for conventional pull request title. by @ymauray in https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/pull/2
* docs: updated README.md by @ymauray in https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/pull/4
* refactor: switched to riverpod by @ymauray in https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/pull/3
* feat: check for updates, and do the actual update by @ymauray in https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/pull/5


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ymauray/deborah/compare/v0.1.4-alpha...v1.0.0-beta.1

name: v0.1.4-alpha
body:
* Cache and reuse search term
  * Return to application list when privilege elevation is refused
  * Implemented options pannel

name: v0.1.2-alpha
body:
* Updated README.md
  * Added version information in sidebar
